Package me.agno.gridjavacore.annotations

Interface IGridAnnotationsProvider<T>

Type Parameters:
T - the type of the grid class
All Known Implementing Classes:
GridCoreAnnotationsProvider
public interface IGridAnnotationsProvider<T>
The IGridAnnotationsProvider interface provides methods to retrieve grid annotations for a given class representing a grid.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    GridColumn
    getAnnotationForColumn(String name, Class<T> type)
    Retrieves the GridColumn annotation for a given column name and type.
    GridTable
    getAnnotationForTable(Class<T> type)
    Retrieves the GridTable annotation for a given class representing a grid table.
    List<Map.Entry<String,GridColumn>>
    getAnnotationsForTableColumns(Class<T> type)
    Retrieves the annotations for table columns of a given class representing a grid.
    boolean
    isColumnMapped(String name, Class<T> type)
    Determines whether a column is mapped based on the given name and type.

  • Method Details

    • getAnnotationForColumn

      GridColumn getAnnotationForColumn(String name, Class<T> type)
      Retrieves the GridColumn annotation for a given column name and type. This method is used to customize the behavior and appearance of a column in a grid.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the column
      type - the class type of the grid
      Returns:
      the GridColumn annotation for the column, or null if not found

    • isColumnMapped

      boolean isColumnMapped(String name, Class<T> type)
      Determines whether a column is mapped based on the given name and type.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the column
      type - the class type of the grid
      Returns:
      true if the column is mapped, false otherwise

    • getAnnotationForTable

      GridTable getAnnotationForTable(Class<T> type)
      Retrieves the GridTable annotation for a given class representing a grid table. This method is used to retrieve the grid table settings defined by the annotation.
      Parameters:
      type - the class type of the grid table
      Returns:
      the GridTable annotation for the grid table, or null if not found

    • getAnnotationsForTableColumns

      List<Map.Entry<String,GridColumn>> getAnnotationsForTableColumns(Class<T> type)
      Retrieves the annotations for table columns of a given class representing a grid.
      Parameters:
      type - the class type of the grid
      Returns:
      a list of map entries containing the column name as the key and the GridColumn annotation as the value
